source: The continue statement tells Python to skip over the current iteration and move on with the next.

pathway = ['Data Science Track', 
           'Career Ready Track', 
           'Microsoft Office Specialist',  
           'Adobe Certified Professional']
for name in pathway:
    if name == "Microsoft Office Specialist":
        print("Skipping this iteration.")
        continue  # Skip iteration if true.
    print(name)
print("Out of the loop")

outputs.name: stdout
text:
Data Science Track
Career Ready Track
Skipping this iteration.
Adobe Certified Professional
Out of the loop

outputs.name: stdout
text:
m
y

source:
n = 6
while n > 0:
    n -= 1
    if n == 2:
        continue
    print(n)
print('Loop ended.')
